document_name: Order No. 2013-2374 / MSIPC-SG (Steering Committee of the Project for Disaster Risk Management and Adaptation to Climate Change)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MLI/2013/MLI-2013-07-06-Order No. 2013-2374 _ MSIPC-SG (Steering Committee of the Project for Disaster Risk Management and Adaptation to Climate Change)_7a66d325b62dc6f18e6fbb18b51d5db9.pdf
document_description: This Order establishes with the Department of Homeland Security and Civil Protection a Steering Committee of the Project for Disaster Risk Management and Adaptation to Climate Change in Mali (PGRCACC).
